messages.content:
user controls random emoji using 'y' (up left), 'u' (up right), 'g' (left), 'h' (pass), 'j' (right), 'b' (down left), 'n' (down right); background https://picsum.photos/200/300; many randomly placed emoji monsters and collectible items; score display, health display; collect gems and avoid monsters
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
